impactDescription: I'm a crypto neubie and also a airdrop hunter person, i have a small airdrop (tesnet contributors) circle from Ubix Network, Core Chain, BNB Community and ZetaChain. I hope I can bring some of them, who not yet know very well about Optimism into the Optimism Community and also learn and updating our knowlegde about Optimism Chain Ecosystems.
